name: Zettabyte Dreadnought
description:
This ship = big OP in every conceivable way. This thing has hella armor and phase slots, and has an extra 100% damage and phase screen. This allows of over 60k phase screen energy. Upon every phase screen, it fires an omega gay missile, with an AOE of 6000m. It does a plasma burst every 10,000 damage it takes, similar to a harvester, with a range of 8,000 meters. 
Itll kill everything, this thing is an abomination. It cannot strafe at all though.
obtaining: You can attack any of the following to get fragments for the dreadnought: Pharmakon Proxy (120), Pharmakon Ping (120), Pharmakon Serial (120)
author: Karkarion
